name: solr-jsx
description: A lightweight, JavaScript engine for building Solr requests

scripts.test: npm run prepare && mocha test --require expectations
scripts.prepare: npm run build && terser -mc --ie8 --keep-fnames -o ${npm_package_name}.min.js -- $npm_package_main && chmod a-w $npm_package_name*.js && zip ${npm_package_main}.zip LICENSE ./$npm_package_name*.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git tag -am "Release $npm_package_version." ${npm_package_version} && git push --tags
